TABLE.NAME: miwriter
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the data storage table for MI-Writer. It is installed by the MI-Writer Recorder plugin.

FIELD.NAME: text
FIELD.COMMENT: The entire text of the edit in question.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the course in which this edit was made.

FIELD.NAME: moduleid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID number of the module to which this entry refers. Usually, this is a quiz.

FIELD.NAME: attemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: The quiz_attempt ID associated with the quiz linked to by the moduleid.

FIELD.NAME: forumid
FIELD.COMMENT: If the text is coming from a particular forum, this is the ID of the relevant forum.

FIELD.NAME: textarea
FIELD.COMMENT: The HTML ID of the text area from which the text was gleaned. May contain the question number of the quiz.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the user making the edit.

FIELD.NAME: timestampmicro
FIELD.COMMENT: UNIX timestamp in microsecond format. Should be returned from PHP's microtime(true).

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID number of the question being edited (if edited item is a quiz).

FIELD.NAME: wordcount
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of words in the document at this edit.

FIELD.NAME: sentencecount
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of sentences in the document at this edit.

FIELD.NAME: paragraphcount
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of paragraphs in the document at this edit.

FIELD.NAME: spellerrors
FIELD.COMMENT: Total number of spelling errors in the document at this edit.

FIELD.NAME: spellerrorwords
FIELD.COMMENT: A comma-separated list of words that are misspelled.

FIELD.NAME: spellerrorpos
FIELD.COMMENT: A comma-separated list of integers that represents the word locations in the document where the spelling errors are. Word numbers are 0-indexed. These are NOT string character positions. This list corresponds with spellerrorwords.
